name: Rossignol BlackOps Smasher XP Skis + Bindings - Youths
description: Young shredders will love these skis. The BlackOps Smasher fits the bill for charging the mountain or getting in some groomed laps. Blending versatility and float in a durable yet agile package, they suit intermediate to advanced skiers who are looking for a playful ride and the freedom to go beyond the resort. The powder-turn rocker ads grip on the groomers while the tip and tail offer flotation and steering control.Rossitop cap and extended core construction strengthens the ski and facilitates rebound for control in varied conditions.Poplar wood core keeps the weight low while offering the progressive flex and pop we love.Torsional stability and durability is provided by fibreglass reinforcement.Damp Tech insert reduces ski vibrations.Powder turn rocker for ski performance in both hard and soft snow.Includes Look XPress 10 GW B93 bindings with a 2.5-10 DIN range.
